title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hezbollah Terror Infrastructure in Southern Lebanon: Overnight Attacks Explained”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Hezbollah’s terror infrastructure in use alongside a military building; the IDF attacked terror targets in southern Lebanon overnight.

During the night, Air Force fighter jets attacked a military building of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Yaroun area in southern Lebanon, alongside four other terrorist infrastructures of the organization in the region.

Also, a short time ago, IDF forces attacked to remove a threat in the Yaroun area.

In addition, earlier today, an alert was activated about missile and rocket fire in the Metula area, but it turned out to be a false identification.

See footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3WtPOE3
